items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t have opened the door without your help.
I still need to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
I suspect that Tom didn\'t want to do that with Mary.
Mary doesn\'t like it when Tom takes her for granted.
If you do that, you\'ll be making a fool of yourself.
Do you think you could teach me to play the bagpipes?
I don\'t remember ever seeing Tom carrying a red bag.
I don\'t remember where I met Tom for the first time.
I don\'t see any way of stopping Tom from doing that.
Tom falls in love with every beautiful girl he meets.
